atproto.science

Home

ATProto Science is an initiative aimed at fostering an ecosystem for science on ATProto — developing tools, communities, and infrastructure for publishing, curation, data sharing, and social discourse around research. We also organize events and workshops to bring the community together.

Join Us

About Us

Learn about the team behind ATProto Science and our mission to foster an inclusive research ecosystem on ATProto.

Products

Explore projects building tools for science publishing, research feeds, AI applications, and decentralized infrastructure on ATProto.

Events

Join our workshops and community gatherings, including the upcoming ATProto x Science workshop at ATmosphere Conf.
